headline: Why Are Robinhood (HOOD) Shares Soaring Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 6.3% in the afternoon session after Cathie Wood's Ark Invest purchased approximately $21.3 million worth of the company's stock, signaling renewed confidence in the online brokerage. The investment firm added roughly 167,400 shares through two of its exchange-traded funds, the Ark Innovation ETF (ARKK) and the ARK Next Generation Internet ETF. This significant buy-in was seen as a positive sign from a prominent institutional inv

headline: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Buys $21M Worth in Robinhood Stock
summary: Top asset management firm Ark Invest has invested $21 million into the acquisition of Robinhood Markets (NASDAQ: HOOD) stock. This marks another routine rebalancing of its financial portfolio. Noteworthy, the stocks were distributed across two of the firm’s Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs).
